dataset_id.description: Identity of the validated dataset snapshot (inputs/rulepack/params), not the bundle hash. Matches preflight report dataset_id.

attestation_id.description: Link to PASS attestation stamp (present when validation passed)

source_report.description: Relative path to the preflight report JSON within the bundle (e.g., "preflight_report.json")

created_at_utc.description: ISO 8601 UTC timestamp when the bundle was created

fairy_version.description: Semantic version of FAIRy that created this bundle (e.g., "0.2.0", "0.2.0-rc1", "0.2.0+abc123")

hash_algorithm.description: Hash algorithm used for file integrity verification (currently sha256)

files.description: Array of files in the bundle. Note: paths must be unique (enforced in code/tests; uniqueItems only prevents identical entire objects).

path.description: Relative path from bundle root (must not be absolute, contain '..', or contain backslashes)

sha256.description: SHA-256 hash of file contents (required for bundle integrity verification)

bytes.description: File size in bytes (optional, if cheap to compute)
